CutSceneText.Text: (You hear a desperate man's voice coming from somewhere)
The ring... You are wearing... My father's ring...
I am talking to you through my dead father's ring with my magic...
I implore you! Please avenge my father!
The Nightmare in the Rabek Canyon murdered my father!
I'll give you something good if you could fulfill my wish! I promise you!
If you don't know what the Nightmare is...
Go to the guard post in the east of the Gribade Fault Plain and ask Illodia about it!
Thank you... Because of you... I was able to avenge myself and my father...
...Now... I can leave... Elysea... Without any regrets..
...Now... I can leave... Elysea... Without any regrets..
Be well... Illodia... May we meet again, soon...
